00031 class Envelope;

00034 class EffectClickRemoval: public Effect {
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038    EffectClickRemoval();
00039    virtual ~EffectClickRemoval();
00040 
00041    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00042       return wxString(_("Click Removal..."));
00043    }
00044 
00045    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00046      std::set<wxString> result;
00047      result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#NoiseRemoval"));
00048      return result;
00049    }
00050 
00051    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00052       return wxString(wxT("ClickRemoval"));
00053    }
00054 
00055    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00056          return wxString(_("Removing clicks and pops..."));
00057    }
00058 
00059    virtual bool PromptUser();
00060    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00061 
00062    virtual bool Init();
00063 
00064    virtual bool CheckWhetherSkipEffect();
00065    
00066    virtual bool Process();
00067 
00068 private:
00069    bool ProcessOne(int count, WaveTrack * track,
00070                    sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00071 
00072    void RemoveClicks(sampleCount len,
00073                     float *buffer);
00074 
00075    Envelope *mEnvelope;
00076 
00077    int       windowSize;
00078    int       mThresholdLevel;
00079    int       mClickWidth;
00080    int  sep;
00081 
00082 friend class ClickRemovalDialog;
00083 };
